content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good candidate for CoC Shortest Mode. There is an obvious soultion with multiple if statements, but it can be very much optimized by some more clever approach.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I am waiting for that

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's a common programming task with a unique twist to it.
In fastest mode, it can be solved quite quickly if they know the order
of the if statements.
The test cases are quite good at summarizing what the task is.
